Articles.Content:
I'm playing KSP v1.6.1 with RO and RP1 and I've got a really annoying effect where the orbit lines of planets and craft show up through planets which makes it really hard to orient yourself in the tracking station. I've ported the game directory to different hardware and it makes no difference. I can't deinstall any of the graphics mods as they're prerequisites for RO / RP1 and cause RO or RP1 deinstall via CKAN.

Has anyone seen this effect before ? Am I missing something obvious ?
